## `prefer while`

### `0`

```

 unknown:1 lint/js/preferWhile FIXABLE ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

  ✖ A while loop should be used over a for loop

  > 1 │ for (; x.running;) {
      │ ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  > 2 │   x.step();
  > 3 │ }

  ℹ Recommended fix

      │ - for (;·x.running;) {
    1 │ + while (x.running) {
      │ - ··x.step();
    2 │ + ↹x.step();
    3 │   }

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

✖ Found 1 problem

```

### `0: formatted`

```
while (x.running) {
	x.step();
}
```
